title: Frontend Developer
description: We are looking for a passionate frontend developer with experience in React and Tailwind CSS.
jobResponsibilities: Develop and maintain user interfaces using React.js.
Implement responsive designs with Tailwind CSS.
Collaborate with backend developers to integrate APIs.
Ensure cross-browser compatibility and performance optimization.

title: Backend Developer
description: Join our team as a backend developer. Proficiency in Node.js and MongoDB is required.
jobResponsibilities: Develop and manage server-side logic using Node.js.
Design and maintain databases with MongoDB.
Ensure data security and system scalability.
Collaborate with frontend developers for seamless integration.

title: UI/UX Designer
description: Seeking a creative UI/UX designer with a strong portfolio of modern designs.
jobResponsibilities: Create wireframes, prototypes, and user flows.
Collaborate with developers to implement designs.
Conduct user research and usability testing.
Maintain and update design systems and guidelines.
